loans.use: to purchase some sheep for fattening and resale, in order to help bolster her income.

loans.name: Maritza Del Carmen

texts.es:
Bien dicen que: largo es el camino del aprendizaje y que este siempre debe permanecer hasta el último día de nuestras vidas. Este consejo lo ha sabido aplicar bien Maritza a su vida, ya que, a sus 50 años aun desea seguir estudiando para tener una mejor vida. Ella cursa el último año de la carrera de Administración de empresas y desde hace 15 años se desempeña como ingeniera mecánica, labor que le ayuda a sacar adelante a su familia.

Ella solicita el crédito ya que desea solventar los gastos de su culminación de estudios y título para de esta forma seguir desempeñando mejor su trabajo. Las metas y planes  de Maritza son estudiar un posgrado y ver que su hija se titule como doctora, asimismo, sentirse realizada como madre, esposa y mujer.
texts.en:
As the saying goes: long is the road of learning, and so it should remain until the last day of our lives. Maritza has known how to apply this advice to her life given that, in her 50s, she continues to want to study to have a better life. She is in her last year of a Business Administration course. For the past 15 years she has worked as a mechanical engineer, a job that has helped her to provide for her family.

She is requesting a loan because she wants to pay off the cost of finishing her studies and qualification, in order to continue carrying out her job better. Maritza's goals and plans are to study a postgraduate degree and see her daughter qualify as a doctor, and in this way, to feel fulfilled as a mother, wife and a woman.

loans.use: to pay off the cost of finishing her studies and her qualification.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to carry out some tests for his son and buy medicine, as he has been sick for two months and he does not have enough money to pay for the medical expenses.

loans.name: Jorge Isabel

texts.es:
Jorge, de 52 años de edad, estudio hasta tercer grado, está casado y vive junto a su esposa y un nieto.

Jorge es pescador y albañil, tiene 40 años de trabajar como pescador, este trabajo lo aprendió gracias a unos amigos de la comunidad cuando estaba pequeño y es albañil, con los ingresos de ambos trabajos mantiene a su familia.

Jorge, necesita el préstamo para comprar un motor para la lancha.

Los sueños de Jorge son: seguir trabajando y tener mejore calidad de vida para darle un mejor futuro a su familia.
texts.en:
Jorge is 52 years old and studied up until third grade. He is married and lives with his wife and a grandson. Jorge is a fisherman and bricklayer. He has worked as a fisherman for 40 years and he learned this line of work from some friends in his community when he was little. He is also a bricklayer, and with the income from his two jobs he can provide for his family. 

Jorge needs a loan to buy a motor for his boat. His dreams are to continue working and to have a better quality of life to give his family a better future.

loans.use: to buy a motor for his boat.

loans.name: Walter

texts.es:
El socio es el señor Walter, él socio continua dedicándose a la  ganadería, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, él socio a la vez continua dedicándose a  operar  maquinaria pesada, siendo de esta manera que el socio saca adelante a su familia.
El socio solicito el crédito para la compra de una vaca.
El socio Walter pertenece al banco comunal “San Bartolo de Tambo Real” distrito de Tambo Real de la provincia de Anta en Cusco – Perú.
texts.en: Our member Walter still works in cattle-rearing. He has been running his business for some time now and it is going well on account of the effort which he devotes to it each day. Alongside this, he also operates heavy machinery as a means of supporting his family. He is applying for a loan to buy a cow. Walter is a member of the “San Bartolo de Tambo Real” communal bank in the Tambo Real district of Anta province which is in Peru's Cusco region.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Soledad

texts.es:
La socia  pertenece al banco comunal SAN BARTOLOME DE TAMBO REAL, la socia continua  dedicándose a la ganadería y a la  venta de quesos y yogurt, la socia lleva buen tiempo con sus negocios los cuales le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a sus negocios, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para comprar una vaca y alimentos para sus animales.
La socia se siente agradecida  con el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member of the communal bank San Bartolome de Tambo Real continues to make a living raising livestock and selling cheese and yogurt.  She has been in this business for quite some time and it is going well thanks to the effort that she puts in every day.  She wants to be able to continue working and supporting her family.  

She is applying for a loan to buy a cow and feed for her animals.  She is grateful for the loan and committed to paying her installments.

loans.use: to buy a cow and feed for her animals

loans.name: Tomasa

texts.es:
La socia Tomasa  se sigue dedicando al negocio de tienda de abarrotes y restaurant, la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, leche y galletas, la socia por medio de este negocio quiere salir adelante, la socia es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar arroz, azúcar, leche y galletas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Tomasa continues making a living with her grocery store business and restaurant.  She sells basic necessities such as rice, sugar, milk, and cookies.  She is an enterprising and hard-working woman, and she wants to use this business to get ahead.  Her dream is to expand her grocery store business.  

She is applying for a loan to buy rice, sugar, milk, and cookies.  She is happy about this loan and committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, milk, and cookies

loans.name: Serapio

texts.es:
La agricultura, para Don Serapio es la mejor de todas las ocupaciones y a la vez un arte. Él es un hombre de 53 años, honorable y de alto espíritu. Agradece a Kiva y a Mi crédito porque gracias a los créditos que se le han brindado pudo obtener una buena cosecha de Maíz y frijoles, la cual, le aporto buenos ingresos para apoyar a su familia y a uno de sus hijos. 
Ahora, él solicita un nuevo crédito ya que desea invertir en la compra de 2 cajas de veneno, urea, abono e insecticidas para proteger sus cultivos y para pagar a mozos que le ayuden a la siembra de los mismos. Sus metas son seguir trabajando en la agricultura y vender para lograr sembrar en la próxima cosecha. Además espera tener mejores ganancias para pasar más tiempo con su familia y así no tener que emigrar a otro país para trabajar en el corte de café.
texts.en: In Serapio's opinion, agriculture is the best job of all and is also an art. He is 53 and is an honourable and spirited man. He is grateful to Kiva and Mi Crédito because it is because of loans from them that he was able to have a good corn and bean harvest, which enabled him to provide a good income to support his family and one of his children. He is now asking for a new loan to buy 2 boxes of poison, urea, manure and insecticide to protect his crops and pay some lads to help him sow his crops. His ambitions are to continue working in agriculture and sell his produce so he can sow new crops for the next harvest. He would also like to boost his income so he can spend more time with his family and avoid having to emigrate to another country to work harvesting coffee.

loans.use: to buy 2 boxes of poison, urea, manure and insecticide.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy and sell peanuts by the 100lb

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
La socia Rosa pertenece al banco SAN BARTOLOME DE TAMBO REAL, la socia se dedica a la ganadería, producción y venta de leche, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a sus negocios los cuales le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone a cada uno de ellos, la socia a la vez se dedica a la crianza de animales menores, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra  de cuyes entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en: Rosa belongs to the SAN BARTOLOME DE TAMBO REAL communal bank.  Her work involves rearing cattle and producing and selling milk. She has been running her businesses for some time now and all is going well because of the effort which she puts into them all. She also breeds small animals. She wants to be able to continue working because this means that she can continue supporting her family. She is applying for the loan to buy guinea pigs, among other things. She is grateful for the loan and promises to pay it back within the set period.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs, among other things.

loans.name: Leandro

texts.es:
Leandro tiene 37 años de edad, vive en su casa de material rústico, en el distrito de Callayuc, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Cutervo que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la destilación de “aguardiente” una bebida producida a base de caña de azúcar tradicional de la sierra norte del Perú, cuenta con experiencia en este negocio y con buenas referencias personales y laborales por parte de sus clientes. Leandro ha solicitado un préstamo para realizar reparaciones y mantenimiento a sus equipos de destilación ya que se encuentra en mal estado y con eso incrementara sus ganancias lo que le va a permitir mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Leandro is 37 years old. He lives in his house made of rustic materials in the district of Callayuc. The people of his town make a living in agriculture, commerce and ranching. Callayuc is located in the Cutervo province, a part of the Cajamarca region in the northern highlands of Peru.

He is a distiller of "aguardiente", a drink made from traditional sugarcane grown in the northern highlands of Peru.  He has experience in this business as well as good personal and professional references from his clients.  Leandro has requested a loan to carry out repairs and maintenance on his distillation equipment that is in a state of disrepair, so that he can increase his profits and therefore improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to carry out repairs and maintenance on his distillation equipment that is in bad condition

loans.name: Susana

texts.es:
Doña Susana es una carismática y emprendedora mujer, quien se destaca por sus deseos de superación. Ella agradece a Kiva y Mi crédito ya que gracias al crédito que le brindo pudo invertir más en su pulpería y comprar mercadería como: arroz, azúcar, dulces, etc. los cuales le ayudaron a satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes y obtener ganancias. 

Ahora doña Susana solicita nuevamente el crédito porque desea surtir una vez más su negocio y comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, jabón y otros productos como frutas para hacer fresco y poder ofertar otros servicios a sus clientes, para así obtener mejores ganancias. Sus metas son reforzar su negocio y más adelante solicitar un crédito para construcción.
texts.en:
Susana is a charismatic and entrepreneurial woman who is notable for her desire to overcome.  She is thankful to Kiva and MiCredito, since the loans they have provided her with have allowed her to invest more in her small grocery store and buy more merchandise such as rice, sugar, and candy, and other products that helped her to satisfy the needs of her customers and make a profit.  

Presently, Susana is applying for another loan because she wants to restock her business and buy rice, sugar, oil, soap, and other products such as fruit to make juice and offer other services to her clients in order to make better profits.  Her goals are to strengthen her business and apply for a loan for construction in the future.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, oil, soap, and other products such as fruit

loans.name: Yoselin

texts.es:
Yoselin es una mujer de 23 años de edad, vive con su pareja, tiene 1 hijo varón de 3 años, y su negocio es la venta de ropa para bebé. 
Ella es buena madre, amable, alegre, siempre está sonriéndole a la vida y se lleva muy bien con sus clientes. Su negocio lo desarrolla de forma ambulante en la zona ‘16 de julio’; área estratégica porque tiene mucho flujo comercial; es una muestra de la producción de pequeñas y medianas empresas, se denota el panorama típico comercial e industrial de la ciudad, de clima frio y seco con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre  0-16 grados centígrados y se encuentra a una altitud de 4070 metros sobre el nivel del mar.
Yoselin es de tez morena, cabello negro largo lo usa amarrado, ojos pardos, baja estatura, complexión física delgada, su lengua materna es el Aymará que habla en familia y habla español por cultura general y por el negocio que realiza. Su vida la comparte con su pareja que trabaja como transportista y con su hijo que es un bebé, viven en casa de la familia de su pareja que es propia y está construida de ladrillo con techo de calamina cuenta con agua potable, electricidad, gas domiciliario y alcantarillado.  Su negocio es la venta de ropa y artículos para bebé, como; baberos, medias, zapatos de lana, y otros. Negocio que realiza de forma ambulante porque no tiene tienda, todos los días se dirige a las diferentes ferias y mercados de la ciudad a ofertar sus productos. “inicie mi negocio vendiendo chinelas, luego observé que la ropa de bebé tenía mejor acogida y cambie de productos…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que las ventas son constantes por la cantidad de bebés que existen, la desventaja son los paros de transporte: porque ella trae ropa de otra ciudad y le es difícil movilizarse. Su sueño es abrir una tienda de ropa para bebés y tejer prendas de lana a máquina, ella desea realizar la compra de ropa de bebé por mayor para aumentar su stock, contar con mayor oferta y generar mejores utilidades. Este es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 4 años que se dedica a esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Yoselin solicita un préstamo para la compra de ropa de bebé por mayor para abrir una tienda y vender sus propios tejidos.
texts.en: 23-year-old Yoselin lives with her husband and her 3-year-old son. She runs a business selling baby clothes. She is a good mother who is kind, friendly ever-smiling and who gets on well with her customers. She set up her business by selling her goods in the street in the '16 de julio' area, which is a strategic area with plenty of business, where you can see products made by small and medium-sized businesses. It represents the city's typical commercial and industrial production. It has a cold, dry climate with a daytime temperature which ranges between 0 and 16 degrees centigrade and it is at an altitude of 4,070 metres above sea-level. Yoselin has a dark complexion, long dark hair which she wears tied up, brown eyes and a small, slim frame. Her mother tongue is Aymara, which she speaks with her family, but she speaks Spanish outside the home and for her running her business. She shares her life with her husband (who works as a taxi driver) and her baby son. They live in the house which her husband owns. It is made of stone, with a corrugated meta roof, and has drinking water, electricity, gas and a sewerage system. She works selling clothing and baby products such as: bibs, tights, booties and other things. She sells her goods in the street as she does not have a shop. She goes to different fairs and markets in her city each day to sell her goods. "I started my business selling sandals and I then noticed that baby clothes were more popular and so I changed", she comments. The best thing about her business is that sales are consistently good because there are always plenty of babies. The worst thing is transport strikes, because she brings the clothing from another city and it is difficult to get around. Her dream is to open a baby clothes shop and to weave woollen clothing by machine. She wants to buy baby clothes wholesale to increase her stock, have a better range of goods to offer and boost her income. This is the 1st loan cycle for her business in her 4 years with the institution. This is why Yoselin is seeking a loan to buy baby clothes wholesale so she can buy a shop and sell her own textiles.

loans.use: to buy baby clothes wholesale so she can open a shop and sell her own textiles.

loans.name: Kaiyrgul

texts.ru: Кайыргул 42 года, замужем, мать 4 детей. У Кайыргул среднее образование, с 2000 года занимается животноводством и полеводством. Благодаря упорному труду, в хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 9 коров, 10 овец и 2 лошади, также есть 1,49 ГА поливной земли, где она выращивает клевер для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Деятельность приносит ежемесячный доход около 15,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 95,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 2 лошадей. Доходы от кредита помогут Кайыргул развить ее бизнес и накопить средства на образование ее детей.
texts.en:
Kaiyrgul is 42 years old, married and the mother of four children. Kaiyrgul has secondary education. She has worked with livestock breeding and field crop cultivation since year 2000. 

Thanks to persistent work, her farm currently has nine cows, ten sheep and two horses. She also has 1.49 hectares of irrigated land, where she grows clover for own use and sale. The business brings in a monthly income of around 15,000 som (KGS).

With an aim to further develop her business, she turned to the bank "Bai Tushum" for a loan in the amount of 95,000 som (KGS) to purchase two horses. The income from the loan will help Kaiyrgul develop her business and save money for educating her children.

loans.use: to purchase two horses in order to increase her herd

loans.name: Marlene

texts.es:
Marlene es una señora cuyo esfuerzo y manera de ganarse la vida es bastante admirable , ya que no posee una de sus manos. Se dedica a la producción de queso y de esta labor dependen tanto ella como su hijo quien es estudiante.
Marlene esta solicitando un millón de colones (¢1.000.000) dinero que usará en la compra de una vaca, con esto pretende aumentar la producción de queso y por consiguiente sus ingresos.
texts.en: Marlene is a woman who is to be admired for her efforts and way of earning her living, as she now only has one hand. She works as a cheese producer and it is on this business that both she and her student son depend. Marlene is seeking a loan of a million Colons (¢1.000.000) which she will use to buy a cow. This will enable her to increase her cheese production and, as a result, boost her income.

loans.use: to buy a cow

loans.name: Las Cinco Estrellas Group

texts.es: La Sra. María de 60 años de edad, es separada y tiene 6 hijos de los cuales solo uno depende de ella. Pertenece a la Alcancía comunal “LAS CINCO ESTRELLAS” donde tiene el cargo de Presidenta y está  conformada por 7 mujeres muy responsables con ganas de salir adelante. Tiene como fuente de trabajo la venta de mazamorra que ella misma prepara y los fines de semana se dedica a vender comida a las afueras de un mercado y así de esta forma con su esfuerzo trata de brindar una mejor calidad de vida para su familia. El préstamo lo utilizara en comprar utensilios y una carreta especial para poder vender comida a sus clientes. En la foto del grupo María se encuentra de pie junto a las demás señoras sentadas.
texts.en: 60-year-old María is separated and has 6 children, only one of whom is still dependent on her. She is a member of the “LAS CINCO ESTRELLAS” communal bank for which she is President. The group's 7 female members are all very responsible and determined to make progress. María works selling mazmorra (a  fruit dessert) which she prepares herself and, at weekends, she sells food near a market. Her efforts enable her to provide a better quality of life for her family.  She will use the loan to buy utensils and a special cart so she can sell food to her customers. In the group photo, María is standing among the other seated ladies.

loans.use: to buy utensils and a cart for selling food

loans.name: Zharkynai

texts.ru: Жаркынай, 34 года, замужем, мать 3 детей. У нее средне-специальное образование, работает в школе поваром. В качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи она занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав в 2006 году. Благодаря упорному труду, Жаркынай на сегодняшний день имеет 2 коровы, 9 овец. Также у нее есть 1,22 ГА собственной земельной доли, на которой выращивает картофель. Ежемесячная прибыль Жаркынай составляет 8,500 сом (KGS). Она в целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коровы для откорма и реализации. Доходы от кредита Жаркынай планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса, что позволит улучшить благосостояние ее семьи.
texts.en:
Zharkynai is 34 years old, married and the mother of three children. She has vocational education and works as a cook at a school. As an additional income for her family, she works with livestock breeding and field crop cultivation, after having started with this in 2006.

Thanks to persistent work, Zharkynai currently has two cows and nine sheep. She also has 1.22 hectares of own land, where she grows potatoes. Zharkynai's monthly income is 8,500 som (KGS). 

With an aim to further develop her business, she turned to the bank "Bai Tushum" for a loan in the amount of 40,000 som (KGS) to purchase cows for fattening and reselling. Zharkynai plans to invest the income from the loan in further developing her business. This will allow her to improve her family's well-being.

loans.use: to purchase one cow in order to invest in her business

loans.name: Asiya

texts.ru: Асия, 47 лет, замужем. У нее высшее образование, с 2000 года в качестве основного дохода занимается сельским хозяйством. У нее в хозяйстве есть 2 коровы, 10 овец, а также 4,0 ГА поливной земли в аренде, где она выращивает фасоль. Дополнительно она занимается пошивом национальных изделий. Асия известна, как принципиальный, честный, порядочный и трудолюбивый человек. На сегодняшний день деятельность она получает ежемесячную прибыль в сумме 10,000 сом (KGS). Для дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Асия обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 25,000 сом (KGS), который направит на покупку  овец. Доходы от кредита она планирует использовать для развития своего хозяйства.
texts.en:
Asiya is 47 years old and married. She has higher education. As a main source of income for her family she has worked with agriculture since year 2000. She currently has two cows and ten sheep on her farm. She also rents 4.0 hectares of irrigated land, where she grows haricots. In addition she works with sewing national items. 

Asiya is known as a principled, honest, decent and hardworking person. Currently she has a monthly income of 10,000 som (KGS) from her business. To further develop her business, Asiya turned to the bank "Bai Tushum" for a loan in the amount of 25,000 som (KGS), which she will use to purchase sheep. She plans to use the income from the loan to develop her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional sheep for fattening up and reselling

loans.name: Teodocia

texts.es: La señora Teodocia, tiene 43 años de edad, se casó con el señor Leoncio con el cual tuvo 5 hijos de los cuales cuatro son dependientes. Su esposo era albañil pero cuando realizaba la construcción de una vivienda falleció hace más de un año dejando a la señora Teodocia como responsable de sus hijos. Ella tuvo que trabajar en todo tipo de empleos como ser: floricultura, plantaciones, lavandería, etc. pero como actividad principal contaba con la cría de chancho pero ya los vendió ya que los precios del alimento incrementaron. Hace más de un año empezó a realizar el comercio de verduras durante las madrugadas, donde revende a comerciantes mayoristas. El crédito que solicita la señora es para comprar mayor mercadería y obtener mas ingresos para cubrir los gastos familiares y del colegio de sus cuatro hijos.
texts.en: Teodocia is 43 years old. She married Leoncio with whom she had 5 children, of whom four are dependent on her. Her husband was a bricklayer but when he was working on building a house, he died over a year ago, leaving Teodocia responsible for their children. She had to work in all sorts of jobs such as growing flowers, working on farms, laundry, etc. but as her primary work, she raised pigs, but she has sold them since the food prices went up. Over a year ago, she began to work selling vegetables during the early mornings, where she resells to wholesalers. The loan that she is requesting is to purchase more merchandise and get more income to cover family expenses and school costs for her four children.

loans.use: to purchase more merchandise and get more earnings to cover family costs and those of schooling for her four children.

loans.name: Parida

texts.ru: Парида, 48 лет, замужем, мать 3 детей. В качестве основного источника дохода для своей семьи на протяжении 16 лет занимается разведением скота и полеводством. Благодаря упорному труду на сегодняшний день Парида имеет в хозяйстве 4 коровы, 3 лошади и 15 овец, участок мерою 0,42 Га. Деятельность Париды приносит ей ежемесячную прибыль в сумме около 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития ее бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров, что позволит ей увеличить поголовье скота и будущие доходы ее семьи.
texts.en:
Parida is 48 years old, married and the mother of three children. As a main source of income for her family, she has worked with livestock breeding and field crop cultivation for a period of 16 years. 

Thanks to persistent work, Parida currently has four cows, three horses and 15 sheep on her farm. She also has a plot of land of 0.42 hectares. Parida's business brings her a monthly income of around 10,000 som (KGS). 

With an aim to further develop her business, she turned to the bank "Bai Tushum" for a loan in the amount of 80,000 som (KGS) to purchase cows. This will allow her to increase her herd and the future income of her family.

loans.use: to purchase some cows in order to increase her herd and her family's future income

loans.name: Pazilatkhan

texts.ru: Пазилатхан 51 год, замужем, мама 3 детей. У нее среднее образование, по характеру: спокойная, добрая и целеустремленная. В качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, уже много лет занимается животноводством и полеводством. Благодаря упорному труду Пазилатхан в хозяйстве имеется: 3 коровы, 15 овец, на 0,80 Га земли она выращивает кукурузу и картофель. Ее деятельность приносит около 45,000 сом (KGS) в квартал. Пазилатхан в целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, решила обратиться в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров для откорма и реализации. Доходы от кредита Пазилатхан планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего хозяйства, что позволит ей увеличить доходы семьи.
texts.en:
Pazilatkhan is 51 years old, married and the mother of three children. She has secondary education. As a person she is calm, good and purposeful. As a main source of income for her family, she has worked with livestock breeding and field crop cultivation for many years. 

Thanks to persistent work, Pazilatkhan currently has three cows and 15 sheep on her farm. She also has 0.80 hectares of land where she grows sweet corn and potatoes. Her business brings in around 45,000 som (KGS) per quarter. 

With an aim to further develop her business, Pazilatkhan decided to turn to the bank "Bai Tushum" for a loan in the amount of 60,000 som (KGS) to purchase cows for fattening and reselling. She plans to invest the income from the loan in further improving her business. This will allow her to increase her family's income.

loans.use: to purchase additional cows for fattening up and subsequently reselling

loans.name: Zhainakul

texts.ru: Жайнакул, 61 год, замужем, дети взрослые и самостоятельные. У Жайнакул высшее образование, она работает в школе учителем. Также занимается сельским хозяйством. В хозяйстве есть 6 коров и 12 овец, на 1,50 Га она выращивает картофель для реализации. Ежемесячная прибыль Жайнакул - около 8,000 сом (KGS). Она обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 25,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 6 овец. Данные мероприятия помогут Жайнакул развить ее дело и улучшить благосостояние семьи.
texts.en:
Zhainakul is 61 years old and married. Her children are adults and independent. Zhainakul has higher education. She works as a school teacher. She also works with agriculture. She has six cows and 12 sheep on her farm. She grows potatoes for selling on 1.50 hectares of land. Zhainakul's monthly income is around 8,000 som (KGS). 

Zhainakul turned to the bank "Bai Tushum" for a loan in the amount of 25,000 som (KGS) to purchase six sheep. This will help her develop her business and improve the family's well-being.

loans.use: to purchase six sheep for fattening up and reselling

loans.name: Manuel Antonio

texts.es:
Manuel, de 73 años de edad, no estudio, está casado y su pareja se dedica a la crianza de especies menores, tiene 7 hijos, todos están casados y tienen sus propias casas.

Manuel, se dedica a la ganaderia y la agricultura desde hace 60 años, lo aprendio de sus padres y se dedica a este negocio porque observo que daba buenas ganancias, para llegar hasta su lugar de trabajo viaja en caballo 3 kilometros y su horario es de 7:00 a.m hasta 5:00 p.m.

Manuel, necesita el crédito para comprar una yunta de novillas, esto le servirá para aumentar su negocio y con el dinero restante comprará insumos agricolas para cultivar 14,000 metros cuadrados de maíz y frijol, de esa manera tendrá satisfechas algunas necesidades.

Manuel, sueña con aumentar su ganadería, al igual que su siembra de granos básicos, para incrementar sus ganancias y darle una mejor calidad de vida a su esposa.
texts.en:
Manuel, 73 years old, didn't go to school. He is married and his wife works raising small animals. They have 7 children, all of whom are married and have their own homes. 

Manuel has worked in animal husbandry and agriculture for the past 60 years. He learned it from his parents and works at this business since he observed that it provides good earnings. To get to the place he works, he goes by horse 3 kilometers and his schedule is from 7:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. 

Manuel needs the loan to purchase a yoke of young cattle. This will serve to increase his business and with the remaining money he will purchase agricultural supplies to cultivate 14,000 square meters of corn and beans. In this way, he will satisfy some needs.

Manuel dreams of expanding his livestock, and of planting basic grains, to increase his earnings and give his wife a better life style.

loans.use: to purchase a yoke of young cattle.

loans.name: Claribel Esperanza

texts.es:
Claribel, de 30 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, está casada y su esposo trabaja de peluquero, tienen dos hijos pequeños que aún viven en casa.

Claribel, desde hace varios años se dedica a vender tortillas, lo aprendió para poder ayudarle a su esposo y obtener más ingresos económicos, el negocio lo tiene en la casa y el horario de atención es de 8:00 a.m. a 1:00 p.m.

 
El préstamo Claribel, lo necesita para invertir más en su negocio y comprar maíz, leña y otros materiales que necesita, de esa manera logrará satisfacer sus necesidades que tiene en este momento. 

El sueño de Claribel, es mantener el negocio y a sus clientes, de esa forma lograra percibir ingresos y podrá darles lo que necesitan sus hijos.
texts.en:
Claribel, 30 years old, went to school through secondary school. She is married and her husband works as a barber. They have two small children who still live at home.

For a number of years, Claribel has worked selling tortillas. She learned it in order to be able to help her husband and get more income. She has the business at home and she works at it from 8:00 a.m. to 1:00 p.m.

Claribel needs the loan to invest more in her business and purchase corn, firewood and other materials that she needs. In this way, she will be able to satisfy the needs that she has at this time. Claribel's dream is to keep her business and her customers, in this way she will manage to get income and be able to give her children what they need.

loans.use: to invest in her business and purchase corn, firewood and other materials she needs.

loans.name: Mujeres Maravillosas Group

texts.es:
Lilian es una mujer de 37 años de edad, vive con su pareja, tiene 5 hijos de 10, 9, 7, 5 y 2 años, y su negocio es la venta de comida tradicional.
Ella es buena madre, emprendedora, paciente, comprometida con su trabajdo, responsable y muy trabajadora. Su negocio lo desarrolla en la zona ‘plan 3000’ un lugar caracterizada por su producción donde microempresarios de áreas, como; la costura, el diseño y las artesanías, imitan productos extranjeros para comercializarlos en los principales mercados locales, es la zona más poblada de la ciudad, de clima cálido tropical con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 18-35 grados centígrados.
Lilian es de tez morena, cabello negro largo lo usa amarrado, ojos pardos, baja estatura, complexión física robusta, su lengua materna es el Guaraní que habla en familia y habla español por cultura general y por el negocio que realiza (es la que está sentada la segunda de la izquierda, viste una blusa rosada y agarra con las manos un bolsoncito negro). Su vida la comparte con su pareja que trabaja como chofer y con sus hijos que estudian en la escuela, el menor aún es un bebé y se encuentra a su cuidado, viven en una casa propia construida de ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina y cuenta con agua potable, energía eléctrica y alcantarillado. La necesidad por abastecer a su familia de lo básico indispensable la llevó a liderar una banca de personas con actividades como; venta de poleras, venta de pañales de bebé, venta de cosméticos por catálogo, venta de huevos, venta de zapatos de mujer, venta de helados, venta de carteras y venta de bisutería, para solicitar un préstamo y consolidar sus negocios. Su negocio es la venta de comida tradicional, como; majadito de charque (carne deshidratada, arroz, huevo frito y plátano frito), Chicharrón de Taitetu (Chanchitos de monte ”taitetú” frito), sopa de maní (sopa a base de maní), locotos rellenos (locotos, carne picada, cebollas), y otros. Actividad que realiza para la hora de almuerzo durante todos los días de la semana. Su segunda actividad es la venta de carne, ella acude al matadero municipal 2 veces a la semana para comprar carne por mayor para venderla en su carnicería. Ambas actividades ocupan todo su tiempo y aportan en gran parte los gastos de la familia. “inicie mi negocio de venta de comida debido a que debía cocinar para mi familia que es numerosa, luego abrí una carnicería para abastecer mi negocio de comida…” comenta. La ventaja de sus negocios es que son complementarios y ambos cuentan con clientes constantes, la desventaja es la demanda del mercado. Su sueño es ampliar su carnicería y abrir un restaurante grande, ella desea realizar la compra de carne por mayor para vender en su carnicería y también en para cocinar en su puesto de venta de comida. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 1 año que viene desarrollando esta actividad. 
Es por esos motivos que Lilian solicita un préstamo para la compra de carne para vender en su carnicería y también para cocinar y vender en su puesto de venta de comida.
texts.en:
Lilian is a 37-year-old woman. She lives with her partner and has 5 children, ages 10, 9, 7, 5, and 2, and her business is selling traditional meals.  She is a good mother, enterprising, patient, committed to her work, responsible, and very hard-working. Her business is located in the "Plan 3000" zone, a place characterized by its productivity where there are microbusinesses in areas such as tailoring, design, and crafts, which imitate foreign products to sell them in the principal local markets. It is the most populated zone in the city, and has a warm tropical climate with a temperature that varies during the day between 18-35 degrees centigrade. 

Lilian has dark skin, long dark hair she keeps tied up, dark hair, is short, has a robust physique, her native language is Guaraní, which she speaks with her family and she speaks Spanish due to general culture and for the work she does (she is seated, second from the left, wearing a pink blouse and holding a black bag in her hands). She shares her life with her partner who works as a driver and with their children who are students. The youngest is still a baby and in her care. They live in their own house build of brick and cement with a roof of metal sheeting and which has drinking water, electricity, and sewer services. The need to supply her family with the indispensable basics brought her to establish a bank with people whose work is selling t-shirts, selling baby diapers, selling cosmetics from a catalog, selling eggs, selling women's shoes, selling ice cream, selling wallets. and selling costume jewelry, to ask for a loan and strengthen their businesses. Her business is selling traditional dishes such as majadito de charque (dried meat, rice, fried egg and fried plantain), chicharrón de taitetu (fried wild pigs "taitetú"), sopa de maní (soup with a base of peanuts), locotos rellenos (peppers, chopped meat, onions) and more. She does this work for lunch time all the days of the week. Her second job is selling meat. She goes to the municipal butcher 2 times per week to purchase meat in bulk to sell it in her butcher shop.  Both jobs take all her time and cover a large part of the family expenses. "I began my business selling meals due to having to cook for my family, which is large. Later I opened a butcher shop to stock my food business..." she says. The advantage of her businesses is that they are complementary and both have constant customers. The disadvantage is the demand in the market. Her dream is to expand her butcher shop and open a large restaurant. She wants to purchase meat in bulk to sell in her butcher shop and also to cook at her food stall. This is her first loan cycle with the institution in the 1 year she has been doing this work. 

For these reasons Lilian asks for a loan to purchase meat to sell in her butcher shop and also to cook and sell at her food stall.

loans.use: to purchase meat to sell in her butcher shop and also to cook and sell at her food stall.

loans.name: Servanda

texts.es: La señora Servanda tiene cincuenta y ocho años de edad vive en una zona alejada de la ciudad, se dedica a la agricultura y la producción de leche, pertenece al módulo lechero más cercano y destina toda su producción a la empresa procesadora de leche más grande de la ciudad, además debido a que en la zona existe constante riego su producción de zanahoria no tiene ningún inconveniente en su comercialización ya que es consumida por los pobladores del municipio, la señora tiene experiencia en estos rubros tanto en la agricultura y producción de leche lleva más de treinta cuatro años de antigüedad, actualmente solicita un crédito para refaccionar el establo de su ganado lechero y mejorar su calidad de producción.
texts.en: Servanda is fifty-eight years old and lives in a zone far from the city. She works in agriculture and dairy production, belonging to closest dairy module and sells all her production to the largest dairy processor in the city. In addition, due to there being constant irrigation in her zone, her carrot crop has no problem with sales since it is eaten by most people in the municipality. She has over thirty-four years of experience in these fields of agriculture and dairy production. Now she is asking for a loan to repair her dairy stable and improve her production quality.

loans.use: to repair her dairy stable and improve the quality of production.

loans.name: Minavarhan

texts.ru: Минавархан 50 лет, вдова, есть сын и три дочери. Образование среднее, на протяжении 23 лет Минавархан занимается сельским хозяйством. Благодаря упорному труду, на сегодняшний день в ее хозяйстве имеется корова и 8 овец. Прибыль от ведения бизнеса составляет до 20,000 сом (KGS) в месяц, этих средств не хватает на достойную жизнь. Так как сельское хозяйство это единственный источник доходов для Минавархан, она решила и дальше развивать свой бизнес, поэтому обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку сена и корма для скота, что позволит сохранить скот и приумножить доходы семьи. Минавархан планирует доходы от кредита вкладывать в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса.
texts.en:
Minavarhan is 50 years old and a widow. She has a son and three daughters. She has secondary education and has worked with agriculture for a period of 23 years. Thanks to persistent work, she currently has a cow and eight sheep on her farm. The income from the business is up to 20,000 som (KGS) per month. This money is not enough for a decent life. 

As the farm is the only source of income for Minavarhan, she decided to further develop her business. Due to this she turned to the bank "Bai Tushum" for a loan in the amount of 50,000 som (KGS) to purchase hay and livestock feed. This will allow her to keep her herd and increase the family's income. Minavarhan plans to invest the income from the loan in further developing her business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock feed and hay in order to keep her herd and increase the income

loans.name: Makhabat

texts.ru: Махабат успешно погасила свой кредит, она благодарна Фонду Кива и всем инвесторам, которые помогли ей в финансировании. На сегодняшний день в хозяйстве есть 6 коров и 5 телят. Ежемесячный доход составляет до 25,000 сом (KGS). Для дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Махабат вновь обратилась в Банк «Бай - Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дойных коров, это позволит ей увеличить объемы реализуемого экологически чистого молока. На прибыль от кредита Махабат планирует увеличить своё хозяйство и купить автомобиль для семьи.
texts.en:
Makhabat successfully repaid her loan. She thanks Kiva and all the investors who helped her with the financing. Currently her farm has six cows and five calves. The monthly income is up to 25,000 som (KGS).

To further develop her business, Makhabat again turned to the bank "Bai Tushum" for a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) to purchase dairy cows. This will allow her to increase the volume of organic milk for sale. Makhabat plans to use the income from the loan to improve her business and to purchase a vehicle for her family.

loans.use: to purchase some dairy cows in order to increase the volume of organic milk for sale

loans.name: Anasen Elizabeth

texts.es:
Anasen, de 31 años de edad, no estudio en una escuela, sabe leer y escribir porque sus padres le enseñaron un poco y fue así que aprendió, actualmente está casada, tiene 3 hijos, los cuales están estudiando y su esposo se dedica a la albañilería.

Anasen, es costurera, hace faldas, vestidos, camisas y pantalones, tiene 14 años de realizar esta actividad, el conocimiento lo adquirió de su madre, quien también trabaja de costurera; además, tiene un pequeño negocio de venta de charamuscas y golosinas, los cuales son otros ingresos que tiene aparte del apoyo de su esposo, quien colabora con los gastos del hogar. 

El crédito lo invertirá en el mejoramiento de su vivienda, específicamente comprará 2 puertas y 1 ventana.

Anasen, se dedicará a seguir mejorando las condiciones de vida, para que sus hijos puedan gozar de buena salud, para que continúen estudiando y se preparen académicamente.
texts.en:
Anasen, 31 years old, didn't go to school. She knows how to read and write because her parents taught her a bit and it was in this way that she learned. Currently, she is married, and has 3 children who go to school, and her husband works as a bricklayer.

Anasen is a seamstress. She makes skirts, dresses, shirts and pants. She has done this work for 14 years, and she got the knowledge from her mother who was also a seamstress. In addition, she has a small business selling candies and sweets, which is another income which is part of her support of her husband, who helps with the household expenses. 

The loan will be invested in the improvement of her house, specifically she will purchase 2 doors and 1 window. 

Anases will work to continue improving the condition of their lives, so that her children can enjoy good health, so they continue going to school and prepare themselves academically.

loans.use: to purchase 2 doors and 1 window to improve her house.

loans.name: Shahzada

texts.ru: Шахзада, 37 лет, замужем, 4 детей. У Шахзады среднее образование, она на протяжении многих лет занимается сельским хозяйством, начав этот бизнес с 30,000 сом (KGS). У Шахзады в хозяйстве есть 4 коровы. Летом она отгоняет скот на пастбище, зимой содержит в сараях. По хозяйству помогает супруг. Шахзада решила, в целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, обратиться в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров. Доходы от кредита она планирует вкладывать в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота, что позволит постепенно накопить на строительство дома.
texts.en:
Shahzada is 37 years old, married and has four children. She has secondary education. For many years she has worked with agriculture, after having started this business with 30,000 som (KGS). Shahzada has four cows on her farm. In the summer she takes the livestock to the pasture, and in the winter she keeps them in the barn. Her husband helps her with the farm. 

With an aim to further develop her business, Shahzada decided to turn to the bank "Bai Tushum" for a loan in the amount of 40,000 som (KGS) to purchase cows. She plans to invest the income from the loan in further increasing her herd. This will allow her to gradually save money for building a house.

loans.use: to purchase cows in order to increase her herd

loans.name: Las Divinas Group

texts.es:
Yaquelin es una mujer de 29 años de edad, vive con su pareja, tiene 4 hijos de 8, 6, 5 y 1 año, y su negocio es la venta de gaseosas.
Ella es buena madre, emprendedora, paciente, decidida, responsable y trabajadora. Su negocio lo desarrolla en un barrio de la zona ‘plan 3000’ de la ciudad, área caracterizada por la colonización de migrantes como; tribus ayoreas nativas del lugar y mineros relocalizados de occidente que se apropiaron del lugar y su siguiente generación inició la manufactura y el comercio en todas las áreas, de clima cálido tropical muy húmedo, con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 18-35 grados centígrados.
Yaquelin es de tez morena, cabello negro largo lo usa amarrado, ojos obscuros, baja estatura, complexión física delgada, su lengua materna es el Guaraní que habla en familia y habla español por cultura general y por el negocio que realiza (la segunda de la derecha, viste solera negra y pantalón azul, lleva a una niña en los brazos). Su vida la realiza junto a su pareja que trabaja como constructor y con sus hijos; los 3 mayores estudian en la escuela, la menor es una bebé. Viven en un cuarto propio construido de ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina que cuenta con agua potable, energía eléctrica y alcantarillado. Su sueño de superación y la necesidad de alimentar a sus hijos la llevaron a formar una banca de personas con negocios como; elaboración y venta de carteras de hilo, venta de blusas, venta de empanadas, venta de botones, venta de carne de cerdo, venta de accesorios para teléfono y panadería, para solicitar un préstamo y mejorar sus actividades. Su negocio es la venta de gaseosas. Son las 8 de la mañana y ella se encuentra en su puesto de venta desde hace media hora, todavía continúa acomodando sus gaseosas junto al hielo, los clientes son personas que circulan por el lugar y que a esa hora ya comienzan a consumir sus productos. Su negocio se resguarda del sol con 2 sombrillas una para el negocio y otra para los clientes, también cuenta con unas sillas alrededor para los clientes cansados, todo se realiza al aire libre y de lunes a domingo porque los fines de semana existen ferias por el lugar y la gente continúa rondando. “mi negocio prospera continuamente porque los clientes son constantes y el calor del lugar hace que vengan a refrescarse a cada momento…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que trabaja sin descanso durante toda la semana y ofrece a los clientes un producto acorde a las condiciones climáticas, la desventaja es que existe mucha competencia con productos alternos como; jugos y helados. Su sueño es tener una tienda completa de venta de gaseosas y venta de alimentos de primera necesidad, ella desea comprar alimentos de primera necesidad para abrir una tienda de barrio y cubrir otra necesidad. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 5 años que viene desarrollando esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Yaquelin solicita un préstamo para la compra de alimentos de primera necesidad para abrir una tienda de barrio y cubrir los gastos de sus niños.
texts.en:
Yaquelin is a 29-year-old woman, who lives with her partner, has 4 children, ages 8, 6, 5, and 1, and her business is selling soft drinks.

She is a good mother, enterprising, patient, determined, responsible, and hard-working. Her business is located in the "Plan 3000" zone of the city, an area characterized by settlement of migrants such as Ayorea tribes native to the area and miners relocated from the west who took the place as their own and in the following generation began manufacturing and trade in all areas. It has a warm and very humid tropical climate, with a temperature that varies during the day between 18-35 degrees centigrade. 

Yaquelin has dark skin, long black hair she keeps tied up, dark eyes, is short, has a thin physique, her native language is Guaraní which she speaks with her family and she speaks Spanish due to the general culture and for the work she does (she is the second from the right, wearing a black tank top and blue pants, holding a girl in her arms). She has her life alongside her partner who works in construction, and their children. The three older ones go to school, the youngest is a baby. They live in their own room build of brick and cement with a roof of metal sheeting which has drinking water, electricity and sewer service. Her dream of improving herself and the need to feed her children brought her to form a bank of people with businesses such as making and selling woven wallets, selling blouses, selling empanadas, selling buttons, selling pork, selling telephone accessories, and a bakery, to ask for a loan and improve their businesses. Her business is selling soft drinks. It is 8 in the morning and she can be found at her sales point for the past half hour, she still continues selling soft drinks with ice. Her customers are people who pass by the place and at this time they begin to consume her products. Her business is protected from the sun with two umbrellas, one for the business and the other for the customers. She also has chairs around for the tired customers. She does this all outdoors and from Monday to Sunday because on the weekends there are fairs in the place and the people continue coming around. "My business prospers continually because the customers are constant and the heat of the place makes them come for refreshment at any time..." she says. The advantage of her business is that she works without a break for the whole week and offers her customers a product that matches the climatic conditions. The disadvantage is that there is a lot of competition with alternative products such as juices and ice cream. Her dream is to have a complete store with soft drink sales and basic pantry items. She wants to purchase basic pantry items to open a neighborhood store and cover other needs. This is the first loan cycle with the institution in the 5 years she has been doing this work.

For these reasons, Yaquyelin asks for a loan to purchase basic pantry foods to open a neighborhood store and cover her children's expenses.

loans.use: to purchase basic pantry foods to open a neighborhood store and cover the expenses of her children.

loans.name: Constantina

texts.es: La señora constantina, tiene  36 años de edad, es casada y tiene cuatro hijos dependientes, vive en una comunidad rural muy alejada al área urbano, sus hijos estudian en las unidades educativas del municipio, se dedica a la agricultura, el año pasado sufrió una disminución en sus ingresos económicos por los bajos precios de los productos agrícolas y también por las lluvias que le echaron a perder sus plantaciones de papa. Actualmente está solicitando un crédito para comprar abono químico para la plantación de cebolla y agroquímicos de esta manera mejorara sus ingresos y podrá sacar adelante a su familia además de cubrir los gastos de estudios de sus hijos.
texts.en: Constantina is 36 years old, married, and has 4 dependent children. She lives in a rural community very far from the urban area. Her children study at the municipal schools. She works in agriculture. Last year she suffered a reduction in her income due to the low prices for agricultural products and also because of the rain which ruined her potato crop. Currently she is asking for a loan to purchase chemical fertilizer for her onion crop and agricultural chemicals in this way she will improve her income and will be able to get her family ahead in addition to covering her children's school expenses.

loans.use: to purchase chemical fertilizer for her onion crop and agricultural chemicals and in this way she will improve her income and be able to get her family ahead.

loans.name: Rudis Evenilson

texts.es:
Rudis, de 26 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, actualmente está acompañado, tiene un hijo de 5 años de edad, el cual está estudiando.

Rudis, se dedica a la siembra de maíz, actividad que realiza desde hace 10 años, todo lo que sabe lo aprendió de su padre quien le enseño dicha actividad.- Además, se dedica a la fontanería, esta actividad tiene 8 meses de desempeñarla, de la cual obtiene ingresos para el sustento de la familia y además su esposa le apoya con el cuidado de las aves de corral.

El crédito lo invertirá para preparar la tierra para sembrar maíz y para comprar insumos para la primera fertilización.

El sueño de Rudis, es seguir trabajando en la agricultura, para que con las ganancias que genere, pueda mejorar su casa y darle el estudio a su hijo.
texts.en:
Rudis, 26 years old, went to school to the ninth grade. Currently, he is partnered, and has a 5-year-old son who is going to school.

Rudis works growing corn, work he has done for 10 years. Everything he knows, he learned from his father who taught him this work. In addition, he works in plumbing, work he has done for 8 months, from which he gets income to sustain his family and in addition his wife helps with caring for the poultry. 

The loan will be invested in preparing the land to plant corn and to purchase supplies for the first fertilizing.

Rudis' dream is to continue working in agriculture so that, with the earnings he generates, he can improve his house and provide his son with an education.

loans.use: to prepare the land to plant corn and to purchase supplies for the first fertilizing.

loans.name: Irma Isabel

texts.es:
Todo comienzo es difícil, así lo asegura Irma una micro empresaria que inició a sus 25 años, con los servicios de acarreo de mercadería pesada, y con el tiempo evolucionó a un negocio de mueblería. Ahora, con la ayuda de su esposo, ofrece muebles del hogar como roperos, mesas, centros de entretenimiento y también brinda el acarreo de los mismos, logrando que sea un servicio eficiente que cubre las necesidades de sus clientes. 
Irma solicita el crédito para invertirlo en su mueblería con la compra de nuevos productos como chineros, mesas de noche, comedores, etc. Esto le dará mayor variedad y en consiguiente aumentara sus ingresos económicos. Entre los planes de ella esta abrir otra tienda.
texts.en: "Every beginning is difficult", assures Irma. She is a 25 year old small businesswoman who started a service of transportation of heavy merchandise which developed into a furniture store over time. Nowadays, with her husband's help, she offers home furniture such as wardrobes, tables, entertainment centers, and also transportation services for these, resulting in an efficient service that covers the needs of her customers. Irma is requesting the loan to invest it in her furniture store by buying new products such as China cabinets, night tables, dining sets, etc. This will give her more variety, and therefore, her income will grow. One of her plans is to open another store.

loans.use: to buy new products such as China cabinets, night tables, dining sets, etc.

loans.name: Altinhan

texts.ru: Алтинхан 53 год, замужем, мать 4 детей. В качестве основного дохода для своей семьи она занимается швейным делом, начав свой бизнес 10 лет назад. Благодаря упорному труду, в швейном цехе по пошиву женской одежды есть более 10 рабочих мест, также есть торговый павильон на рынке. Ежемесячная прибыль Алтинхан составляет до 25,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку швейного оборудования и машинки, наносящей краской на ткань различные узоры. Это позволит изготовлять новые модели  и поспособствует расширению ассортимента. Вырученные доходы от бизнеса Алтинхан планирует вложить в открытие цеха по пошиву халатов.
texts.en:
Altinhan is 53 years old, married and the mother of four children. As a main source of income for her family, she works with sewing, after having started her business 10 years ago. Thanks to persistent work, her sewing workshop for sewing women's clothing has more than 10 workplaces. She also has a sales pavilion at the market. Altinhan's monthly income is up to 25,000 som (KGS). 

With an aim to further develop her business, she turned to the bank "Bai Tushum" for a loan in the amount of 150,000 som (KGS), to purchase sewing equipment and machines so that she can make different patterns on the fabric. This will allow her to prepare new models, and will contribute to expanding her assortment. The income Altinhan gets from the business, she plans to invest in opening a workshop for sewing gowns.

loans.use: to purchase sewing equipment and machines for making new patterns on the fabric

loans.name: Reyna Maria

texts.es:
Reyna María tiene más de 12 años de tener una pulpería en su casa, comenzó con poco capital económico pero con el tiempo las ganancias se incrementaron y la ayudaron a que añadiera, poco en poco, más productos. Por ello, hoy su pulpería es una de las más surtidas de su zona.  

El préstamo lo solicita para invertirlo en el negocio y comprar granos básicos, chucherías, salsas de tomate, gaseosas, jugos, galletas, etc. Lo cual le ayudará a  cubrir la creciente demanda de sus diferentes clientes. Entre los planes de Reyna María esta ampliar su negocio e incluir un área de manualidades pues ella también se dedica a eso.
texts.en:
Reyna María has had a grocery store at her home for more than 12 years. She started with little economic capital, but eventually her profits increased and helped her to add, little by little, more products. So today, her store is one of the best stocked stores in the area.

She is asking for a loan to invest it in her business and to buy staple grains, sweets, tomato sauces, soft drinks, juices, biscuits, etc. This will help her to cover the growing demand of her customers. It is one Reyna María's plans to expand her business and to include a craft area, for she is also works in that.

loans.use: to buy staple grains, sweets, tomato sauces, soft drinks, juices, biscuits, etc.

loans.name: Valle Verde Group

texts.es: Al grupo solidario Valle Verde lo integran seis mujeres emprendedoras que solicitan por cuarta ocasión el financiamiento en ADIM, quien lo coordina es Ada una mujer que a sus 59 años ha logrado con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación ser propietaria de un cafetín en su domicilio, este negocio lo impulsó hace diez años con ayuda de su esposo, el crédito actual lo solicita para la compra de bidón de aceite, quintal de arroz, azúcar, café, gaseosas, chivería y una vitrina de seis depósitos para ofrecer una mejor vista de los productos ofrecidos a sus clientes, con los créditos anteriores ha logrado diversificar los productos y por ende ha aumentado la clientela por lo que sus ingresos han mejorado. El resto de las integrantes son, María que tiene la edad de 35 años y es propietaria de una pulpería desde hace siete años, Juana de 38 años de edad quien comercializa ropa de manera ambulante en su comunidad, Hurit una joven de 24 años y quien comercializa ropa de segunda en su comunidad, Elba una señora que tiene la edad de 59 años y comercializa ropa, cosméticos y bisutería, y Lucia una mujer de 28 años quien se dedica a la comercialización de productos varios en su comunidad.
texts.en: The communal banking group Green Valley is made up of six entrepreneurial women who are asking for a fourth round of financing from Kiva field partner ADIM.  Ada is the coordinator of the group.  She is 59 years old and has achieved success through great efforts and dedication.  She runs a small café out of her home.  She began this business ten years ago with the help of her husband.  The current loan will be used to buy a large drum of oil, 100 pounds of rice, sugar, coffee, soft drinks, dairy products, and a glass case with 6 shelves in order to offer a better view for the products sold to customers.  With the previous loans she has been able to diversify her products and in that way increase her customer base so that her income has improved.  The other group members include María, who is 35 years old and owns a small grocery store that she has run for 7 years, Juana, who is 38 years old and sells clothing door to door in her community, Hurit, a young 24 year old woman who sells second hand clothing in her community, Elba, a 59 year old woman who sells clothing, makeup, and jewelry, and Lucía, a 28 year old woman who works selling various products in the community.

loans.use: to buy a large drum of oil, 100 pounds of rice, sugar, coffee, soft drinks, dairy products, and a glass case with 6 shelves in order to offer a better view for the products sold to customers.

loans.name: Los Gigantes Group

texts.es: Grupo solidario integrado por cuatro socios laboriosos, quien lo coordina es el señor Jorge que tiene la edad de 37 años, casado y propietario de un taller de calzado, este negocio lo impulsó hace veinte años con ayuda de su cuñado, el crédito lo solicita para la compra de galón de pega amarilla, pega blanca, royal, conos de hilo, tela, suelas, etc., esto con el objetivo de incrementar la producción y así mejorar las condiciones de vida a su familia. El resto de los integrantes son, la señora Juana que tiene la edad de 43 años y se dedica a la comercialización de ropa en su domicilio, Francis de 27 años de edad y se dedica a comercializar calzado y ropa  por más de un año, y Marlon que tiene la edad de 24 años y es propietario de un taller de zapatería desde hace tres años.
texts.en: This communal banking group is composed of 4 hard working members and is coordinated by Jorge.  He is 37 years old, married, and owner of a shoe repair shop.  This business began 20 years ago with the help of his brother in law.  He is asking for a loan in order to purchase a gallon of yellow adhesive, white adhesive, royal adhesive, spools of thread, fabric, soles for shoes, etc.  The goal is to increase production and thereby improve the living conditions of his family.  The rest of the group members include Juana, who is 43 years old and works selling clothing from her home, Francis who is 27 years old and works selling shoes and clothing and has been in the field for 1 year, and Marlon, who is 24 years old and owns a shoe shop that he has run for the past three years.

loans.use: to purchase a gallon of yellow adhesive, white adhesive, royal adhesive, spools of thread, fabric, soles for shoes, etc.

loans.name: Colirios Group

texts.es: Cuatro microempresarias laboriosas solicitan por séptima ocasión el financiamiento para sus negocios, quienes han demostrado ser personas responsables con sus obligaciones. Quien lo coordina es Rosa que tiene la edad de 26 años y es propietaria de una mini pulpería, este negocio lo impulsó hace un año con ayuda financiera de su compañero de vida, y solicita por el crédito para invertir en granos básicos como es arroz, azúcar, sal, gaseosas, galletas, pan, chiverías, etc., se ha planteado como meta incrementar y diversificar los productos ofrecidos para de esta manera incrementar la clientela y así aportar con los gastos del hogar. El resto de las integrantes son, Patricia de los Ángeles una joven que  a sus 23 años tiene dos años de ser propietaria de una mini pulpería, Patricia del Carmen una señora que tiene la edad de 49 años y se dedica a la elaboración de piñatas y flores artesanales, y la señora Elizabeth que tiene la edad de 44 años y es propietaria de una pulpería desde hace nueve años.
texts.en: Four hard-working micro entrepreneurs are requesting their seventh loan for their businesses.  They have demonstrated that they are responsible with their obligations.  Rosa coordinates this group.  She is 26 years old and owns a mini-grocery store.  She started this business a year ago with the help of her life partner.  She is asking for a loan in order to invest in basic grains like rice, sugar, and salt, as well as soft drinks, cookies, bread, milk products, etc.  Her goal is to grow and diversify the products she offers and in that way increase her customer base and offer more income for her home.  The other group members include Patricia de los Angeles, a young 23 year old woman who has run a small grocery store for the past two years, Patricia del Carmen, a 49 year old woman who works making piñatas and hand-crafted flowers, and Elizabeth, who is 44 years old and owns a small grocery store that she has run for 9 years.

loans.use: to invest in basic grains like rice, sugar, and salt, as well as soft drinks, cookies, bread, milk products, etc.

loans.name: José Francisco

texts.es:
José, de 23 años de edad, estudio unicamente hasta noveno grado, pues no tenia los recursos para continuar estudiando, actualmente está soltero y vive solo con su mamá y su abuelo.

José, actualmente trabaja como ayudante de albañil, pero desde que dejo de estudiar se dedico al trabajo de la agricultura y es así como aprendió a cultivar maíz.

Con el credito que esta solicitando pretende terminar el cultivo que ya tiene sembrado y para ello comprará tres sacos de abono, veneno, insumos orgánicos y pagará mano de obra que le ayude.

El sueño de José, es poder generar ingresos económicos, para poder darle una mejor calidad de vida a su madre y a su abuelo.
texts.en:
Jose, 23 years old, only studied until the ninth grade since he did not have the resources to continue studying. He is currently single and lives with his mother and grandfather. Jose currently works as a mason's helper. Since he stopped studying he has been devoted to agriculture and that is how he learned to cultivate corn. 

With the loan that he is requesting he intends to finish the crop he already planted. For this he will purchase three sacks of fertilizer, pesticide, organic supplies and he will pay labor costs for help.

Jose's dream is to generate income in order to give his mother and grandfather a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy three sacks of fertilizer, pesticide, organic supplies and to pay labor costs for help.

loans.name: Evangelista

texts.en:
Evangelista has considerable preparing to do for the post-harvest operations of her palay in Tambulig, Zamboanga del Sur. She wants to ensure that she has ample time to thresh, dry, store, process and mill her harvest to make way for another cropping season. 

Evangelista has presented her proposal to Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative and requested a loan. She hopes to live comfortably with her family.

loans.use: to pay for post-harvest operations

loans.name: Peregrino

texts.en:
Peregrino joined Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative in 2009. He appreciates the cooperative's programs, services and continuous education. He is a member in good standing and is very active in the various programs and services that the cooperative offers. 

Pergrino has cultivated a rice land near his home. He is requesting a loan of 50,000 Philippine pesos. This loan is intended for farm inputs and labour costs for land preparation. 

Peregrino dreams of nothing more than to have a happy, healthy life and earn an adequate income from his business.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs and pay for labour costs for land preparation

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en:
Julieta is 54 years old. She is a widow with three children and a resident of Lanao Del Norte, Philippines. Starting with capitalization of 4,000 PHP, she opened a sari-sari (small grocery) store and was able to expand it with the help of Paglaum Cooperative. 

Aside from financial assistance, she was able to generate savings and enjoys the benefits given by the co-op. She became a member in May of 2013 and has taken out three loans. Now she is applying for 31,000 PHP to buy additional stock for her sari-sari store, particularly basic goods. 

In the future, Julieta wants to own a mini-mart some day, and will be fully satisfied if she can renovate and expand her house.

loans.use: to buy additional stock for her sari-sari store, particularly basic goods

loans.name: Adelfa

texts.en:
Adelfa is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a tailoring business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 30 years and earns additional income from a general store.

Adelfa is borrowing 29,500 Philippine pesos through the Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation. She will use the loan to purchase additional threads, fabrics, needles and other materials needed for her tailoring business.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional threads, fabrics, needles and other materials needed for tailoring

loans.name: Josefa

texts.en:
Josefa is 61 years old and married with nine children.

Josefa works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stocks of groceries to sell.

Josefa has been in this business for 21 years and has previously received funds through Kiva. She aspires to save enough money so she can continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy shampoo, bath soap and fabric conditioner to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fish to sell.

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
Alma is married with two children. 

Alma runs a general store while her husband does farming to make a living. She has been doing this for six years earning well to sustain the family. 

Alma joined GDMPC and recently took a new loan to purchase more grocery items to sell. Her future dream is to improve her business and save money from her business income.

loans.use: to purchase more grocery items to sell

loans.name: Valeriana

texts.en:
Valeriana is 63 years old and married with seven children. With one child in school, Valeriana works very hard to provide for them.

Valeriana runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like snack foods, canned goods, home products, and other groceries.

Valeriana has been in this business for 15 years and sells a variety of items such as rice, sugar, soap, and other groceries. 

In the future, Valeriana would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like snack foods, canned goods, home products, and other groceries

loans.name: Rosalie

texts.en:
Rosalie is single and works hard to support herself.

Rosalie has a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from raising cows and pigs. 

Rosalie is borrowing PHP 13,000 through NWTF to purchase more items such as sardines, soft-drinks and other groceries for her general store business.

Rosalie has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more items such as sardines, soft-drinks and other groceries.

loans.name: Maria Ana

texts.es:
Marìa tiene 47 años de edad esta casada tiene 47 años de edad tiene 4 hijos y viven en Guaranda en la provincia de Bolivar en la comunidad Paltabamba. 
Ella se dedica a la agricultura hace algunos años , solicita el credito para la compra de una vaca para tener otra fuente de ingreso como es la producción de leche, gracial al credito podra mejorar su calidad de vida y satisfacer las necesidades de su hogar, realiza las compras en Guaranda cada semana, los desafios a los que se enfrenta es las enfermedades y su sueño es darles una buena educación a sus hijos para que lleguem hacer profesionales. En su tiempo libre le gusta organizar minga.
texts.en:
María, age 47, is married and has four children.  They live in Guaranda in the Bolivar province in the Paltabamba community.

She has been working in agriculture for a few years.  She is requesting the loan to buy a cow in order to have milk production as another source of income.  Thanks to the loan, she will be able to improve her quality of life and meet the needs of her household.

She makes her purchases in Guaranda every week.  The challenges she faces are diseases.  

Her dream is to give her children a good education so that they become professionals.  In her free time she likes to organize ‘minga’ [cooperative and voluntary work for the common good].

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Mukaddas

texts.ru: Мукаддас, 44 года, не замужем, есть 2 детей. Образование высшее, работает заведующей кафедрой на экономическом факультете в университете. Ее старший сын самостоятельный, а дочь учится в 8 классе в школе. Заработная плата Мукаддас составляет около 27,500 сом (KGS).В этом году Мукаддас решила отремонтировать свой дом, поэтому она обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 105,000 сом (KGS). Доходы от заработной платы Мукаддас будет вкладывать в дальнейшее улучшение жилищных условий семьи и образование дочери.
texts.en:
Mukaddas is 44 and single with two children. She has a higher education and works as a department head in the faculty of economics at the university. Her oldest son is independent, and her daughter is in eighth grade. Her salary is about 27,500 KGS.

This year, Mukaddas has decided to renovate her home, which is why she has approached Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 105,000 KGS. She intends to put her income toward further improving her living conditions and into her daughter's education.

loans.use: to buy construction materials in order to make some improvements in her house

loans.name: Flora

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Flora works hard to support her family.

Flora has a buy and sell water business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buy and sell ready-to-wear clothing. 

Flora is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy more water containers for her buy and sell water business.

Flora has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her to attain her dream to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more water containers

loans.name: Andrea

texts.en:
Andrea is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a motorcycle transport business in the Philippines. 

Andrea has been in this business for 10 years. Andrea earns more income from farming sugarcane.

Andrea is borrowing PHP 19,000 through NWTF to purchase additional spare parts for the maintenance of her motorcycle for her motorcycle transport business.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. Her dream is to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional spare parts for the maintenance of her motorcycle

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy decorative plants wholesale.

loans.name: Mutiara Group

texts.en:
Ni Nengah, with her fellow members of the Mutiara group, can pay the group's previous loan before the payment is due. The Mutiara group generated better earnings over the last period. 

The result of raising pigs for six months was satisfactory. Ni Nengah, who has a barn that measured two by 1.5 metres, can now enlarge it to four by 1.5 metres. She can sell her pigs to a big buyer and she can set aside money for saving and daily needs. 

During this last loan period, one group member resigned and was replaced by a new member. The Mutiara group has requested its third loan and intends to continue its business. For this loan, the group has asked for a larger amount. 

After having been evaluated by MUK, the group will receive an increased amount. This time, the group will manage pigs for pig barbeque, which can be sold every two months. 

Ni Nengah will use her portion of the loan to purchase four local piglets and feed. She will also give the piglets traditional foods. 

She plans to sell the pigs after two months and buy new piglets. The price for local pigs is more stable than for superior piglets at this time. She hopes her plan will run smoothly and that she can earn more profit.

loans.use: to purchase four local piglets and feed

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sewing notions such as thread and poplin for resale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to complete payment for a piece of land to build on

loans.name: Amie

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Amie works hard to support her family. She has a general store business in the Philippines and earns additional income from farming sugarcane and fattening pigs. 

Amie has successfully paid her previous loan and has requested another loan to further build her general store business. She is borrowing 30,000 Philippine pesos through the Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation. She will use this loan to purchase additional stock to sell in her general store, including coffee, oil, milk and noodles.

Amie has sustained her business activities through her past 22 loans with NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business.
