Rani's husband wants to buy more raw materials for knotting blankets but he does not have enough savings to make this purchase possible. Therefore, Rani requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan, so that her husband can buy more raw materials for knotting blankets and cause an increase in income.

loans.use: to buy more raw materials for knotting blankets

loans.name: Rahat

texts.ru: Рахат, 47 лет, замужем, 2 детей, образование средне-специальное, уже много лет занимается животноводством и полеводством, на сегодняшний день в своем хозяйстве Рахат имеет лошадь, 3 коровы, 24 овцы. Она знает технологию ведения сельскохозяйственной деятельности и умеет вкладывать средства по назначению. Ее ежемесячный совокупный доход составляет около 12,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Рахат обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дойной коровы для увеличения объемов реализации экологически чистого молока. Рахат намерена увеличить поголовье скота, а доходы от кредита позволят ей накопить средства на постройку жилого дома.
texts.en: Rahat is 47 years old, married, and the mother of two children.  She has a specialized secondary education and has been involved in animal husbandry and agriculture for many years.  She currently has one horse, three cows and 24 sheep on her farm.  She is familiar with agricultural technology and she knows how to invest her money as intended.  She makes a total monthly income of about 12,000 som (KGS).  In order to further grow her farming business, she has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and requested a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy one dairy cow in order to sell larger volumes of organic milk.  Rahat intends to increase her livestock headcount.  The earnings from her loan will help her to save money to build a new house.

loans.use: to buy one dairy cow in order to sell larger volumes of organic milk.

loans.name: Charles

texts.en:
Charles is 32 years old. He is married with two children. He has had a farming business for 10 years. He will use this loan to purchase farm inputs and hopes this will help him generate income. 

His hopes and dreams for the future are to provide for the basic needs of his family, educate his children and have plenty of food at home.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs

loans.name: Annah

texts.en:
Annah is 53 years old and a proud mother of a lovely family, whom she really adores and cherishes. It is through Annah’s perseverance and courage that her family can have a respectable life. Other than doing a side hustle business, Annah is a hardworking farmer who has been farming for the past five years. She has gained so much experience through those years of farming. 

Annah practices mixed farming. That is, she grows maize and keeps poultry, and through these activities she has been able to earn a decent and honest income. Because of the passion she has for farming, she has even nicknamed animals on her farm. She really enjoys taking care of her poultry. Although Annah has been making profits through farming, not everything has been easy for this humble and industrious mum. Her farm has not been producing as much of a harvest because of the lack of fertilizer and good seeds and the presence of pests and diseases. That is why she is seeking a loan of KES 30,000 to be able to buy farm implements. Through the loan, Annah will be assured of a bumper harvest, and this will translate into more profits and cash. Through the use of good seeds and fertilizer, Annah will reap more, which will assure her of comfortably taking care of her family and repaying the loan. Annah's plan is to be able to increase her farming and to be able to save more money so that she can buy more land for farming.

loans.use: to buy farm implements.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to construct a cowshed.

loans.name: Jose Adan

texts.es:
José, es un agricultor que vive con su familia, la cual está integrada por su esposa y sus hijos, todos dependen de él, cultiva maíz para alimentar para a su familia y vender a sus vecinos con lo que genera recursos económicos para cubrir otras necesidades familiares, trabaja de siete de la mañana a cinco de la tarde, todos los días, su negocio lo tiene desde hace 8 años.
Comprará semilla, abono e insecticidas para llevar a cabo los procesos de siembra, será de ayuda para aumentar su productividad y seguir trabajando, con ello también cubrirá las demandas de sus clientes y podrá generar ingresos que utilizara para pagar sus deudas.
Los sueños de José son comprar terrenos para trabajar en lo propio, seguir mejorando sus cultivos y darle a su familia mejores oportunidades de desarrollo.
texts.en:
José is a farmer who lives with his family, which is made up of his wife and his children.  They all depend on him.  He grows corn to feed his family and to sell to his neighbors, through which he generates financial resources to cover other family needs.  He works from seven in the morning to five in the afternoon every day.  He has done this work for eight years.

He will buy seed, fertilizer, and insecticide in order to carry out the planting process, which will be helpful to increase his production and to continue working.  With this he will be able to meet the demands of his customers and to generate income that he will use to pay his debt.

José's dreams are to buy land to work on his own, to continue improving his crops, and to give his family better opportunities to progress.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, and insecticides in order to carry out the planting process.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pigs, concentrated feed and wholesale cashews to process and sell.

loans.name: Aghunik

texts.en:
With this loan Aghunik will purchase potato seeds (1.5 tons) and forage for feeding her livestock (350 packages). 

She lives with her husband in Horom village of Shirak region. Their four children are married and live with their families. Aghunik and her husband run their farm together. They keep four cows and fifteen hens as well as cultivate wheat, barley, and potatoes. This loan will be a big help for Aghunik to develop her farming business further and make it more profitable.

The region where they live, Shirak, is considered a poor region, where the unemployment rate is very high and living standards are quite low. Lack of access to loan products, bad market conditions, and high costs create a number of difficulties for people trying to develop their businesses in Shirak region. Aghunik's loan has been approved within the joint initiative between SEF and Kiva, which provides loans to the underserved population of Shirak region, to help them access the market and earn a living.

Please help this hardworking farmer to develop her farm.

loans.use: to pay for potato seeds (1.5 tons) and forage for feeding her livestock (350 packages) so she can develop her farming business and earn income for her family's living

loans.name: Marlon José

texts.es:
Marlon, de 34 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, luego se dedico a aprender el oficio de albañil, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica al trabajo del hogar, juntos han procreado un hijo, el cual está asistiendo a la escuela.

Marlon, trabaja como albañil desde que dejo de estudiar, pero en su tiempo libre se dedica a trabajar en la agricultura.

Con el crédito que está solicitando comprará lo necesario para poder sembrar 7,000 metros cuadrados de maíz y para ello comprará seis sacos de abono, una bolsa de semilla, veneno y pagará mano de obra.

Como todo agricultor, sueña con obtener buenas ganancias en la cosecha, para poder darles una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y poder seguir cultivando.
texts.en:
Marlon, 34, studied up to ninth grade, then he started working as a bricklayer.  He's in a relationship and his partner is a homemaker.  They have one child, who attends school.

Marlon has worked in construction since he left school, but he works in agriculture in his spare time.  Like all farmers, he dreams of making a good profit on his harvest so he can give his family a better quality of life and keep on growing corn.

He's requesting the loan to buy what he needs to plant 7,000 square meters of corn: six bags of soil amendments, a bag of seed, and poison, and to pay for labor.

loans.use: to buy six bags of soil amendments, a bag of seeds, and poison, and to pay for labor

loans.name: Isaias

texts.es:
Isaias, de 30 años de dad, estudio hasta tercer grado, está casado y vive junto a su esposa y su hija de 9 años de edad que está estudiando.

Isaias, tiene 15 años de trabajar en la pesca, es de ese trabajo que suple las necesidades de su familia, él sale a pescar al mar a las 4:00 de la tarde y regresa a las 10:00 de la noche.

Isaias, necesita el préstamo para comprar una lancha, para poder pescar más y mejorar sus ingresos, vale remarcar que Isaias, es una persona con buena reputación en su comunidad.

Los sueños de Isaias son, seguir trabajando hasta lograr una mejor calidad de vida para su familia.
texts.en:
Isaias, who is 30-years old, went to school until third grade.  He is married and lives with his wife and their 9-year old daughter, who goes to school.  

Isaias has worked in the fishing industry for fifteen years.  His work has provided for his family's needs.  Isaias goes out to fish at 4:00 o'clock in the afternoon and returns at 10 o'clock at night. 

He needs the loan to purchase a small boat so that he can fish more and improve his income.  It's worth noting that Isaias has a good reputation in his community. 

His dream is to continue working until he has achieved a better quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to purchase a small boat.

loans.name: Jaime Alonso

texts.es:
Jaime, de 29 años de edad, curso hasta noveno grado, es agricultor, está acompañado y su pareja depende de él, actualmente vive junto a su pareja y un hermano más.

Jaime, trabaja en la agricultura, desde pequeño lo aprendió por su padre y hasta el día de hoy, él se ha desempeñado en esa labor junto a su hermano.- 

Jaime, solicita el crédito para comprar arroz, frijoles, azúcar y otros productos para colocar su propia tienda.

El sueño de Jaime, es que su nuevo negocio sea rentable y en futuro poder ampliarlo y que sea muy reconocida para poder generar mayores ingresos y mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Jaime is 29 years old and went to school until 9th grade. He is a farmer and partnered and his partner depends on him. Right now he lives with his partner and also a brother.

Jaime works in agriculture, which he learned from his father from when he was young until today. He has done that work together with his brother.

Jaime seeks a loan to buy rice, beans, sugar and other products to set up his own store.

His dream is that his new business is profitable and in the future he'll be able to grow and be very recognized so he can earn better income and improve his and his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, sugar and other products to set up his own store.

loans.name: Giorgi

texts.en:
Giorgi is a herdsman in the Kaspi region, which is very hard work. The villagers pay him to take their cows to the mountain pasture and look after them during summer and autumn. This year he wants to have some cows of his own in the herd in order to earn additional money. With the help of the loan, Giorgi will buy seven young cows, herd them together with the other cows, and sell their beef in winter. Free-range keeping is healthy for the cows and their beef is highly valued, so he is sure to achieve a good price.

The repayment for this loan is scheduled in a way that allows Giorgi first to sell the beef and then repay with the revenues.

loans.use: to buy young cows, herd them on the mountain pasture, and sell them when they are full-grown.

loans.name: Letty

texts.en:
Letty sends you her thanks for your generosity because her previous loan has entrenched her business. She was able to purchase additional grocery products needed to increase her product inventory. The loan also helped her provide for her family's daily needs.

She is very positive that she could improve her business further if you lend her an amount of 15,000 PHP. This new loan will go to additional stocks of groceries, toiletries and beverages. Her customers will likely buy more items if she has more of her products displayed in her store. An increase in sales will result in a significant increase in profit, which will also result in her business becoming viable and sustainable. Simultaneously, she could sustain the needs of her family.

Letty hopes that her family is always free from any harm and sickness. She prays for good health and protection every day so she can do her daily tasks and provide for the needs of her family. She meets every week with her *co-fellowship members to share stories of her work and to also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business

loans.name: Yasmin Elizabeth

texts.es:
Yasmin, es una madre y esposa que se decidió por dedicarse a vender medicinas naturales y químicas, con el propósito de generar ingresos que sean de utilidad para salir adelante junto a su familia, vive con su esposo quien es electricista y sus hijos los cuales están estudiando.
Invertirá en vitaminas, pomadas, antibióticos, etc., para ofrecer a sus clientes los medicamentos que necesiten, espera tener nuevos clientes, aumentar ventas y ganancias con las que minimizara las necesidades de su hogar.
Yasmin sueña con tener un negocio más reconocido en la zona, ayudar a otras personas a recuperar su salud y apoyar a sus hijos para que estudien una carrera universitaria y que ayuden a tener una mejor sociedad.
texts.en:
Yasmin is a mother and wife who decided to make a living selling natural and chemical medicines, in order to generate income that is useful to succeed with her family. She lives with her husband who is an electrician, and their children who are in school.

She will invest in vitamins, ointments, and antibiotics, etc., to offer her customers the medicines they need. She hopes to have new customers and increase her sales and profits which will minimize the needs of her home.

Yasmin's dream is to have a more well-known business in the area, to help other people to regain their health, to support her children so that they study in university, and help to have a better society.

loans.use: to invest in vitamins, ointments, antibiotics, etc., to offer her customers the medicines they need.
